I personally run at 2550x1440 but it's resolution independent, all that is handled by Unity and the initial window definition is made by taking the max height/width and subtracting a bit. That means the default window cannot be off you screen. Try installing the vanilla version called No_Kethane - that will run against stock KSP so if it doesn't appear I've no idea what you have wrong.
